title: The position of direct and indirect objects (5-Minute German Grammar)

media:group.media:title: The position of direct and indirect objects (5-Minute German Grammar)
media:group.media:description:
Need these slides for your class? Download them here: http://bit.ly/2muy1eK
About the series producer: https://doktorfrag.wordpress.com

5-Minute German Grammar covers fundamental aspects of German grammar in a shorter period of time, which helps to keep the instructional focus sharp and the material easy to learn. This high definition video with closed captioning will introduce how to position direct and indirect objects in a sentence. Video highlights include:

00:09 Word order with two nouns
00:39 Word order with one pronoun (direct object)
01:03 Word order with one pronoun (indirect object)
01:31 Word order with two pronouns
